summary: Moonyetis Wallet Deployment: Tar, Backup, Restart

message.content:
# Verificar que lleg√≥ el archivo correcto
  ls -lh /tmp/moonyetis-real-wallet-20250629-1148.tar.gz

  # Extraer la versi√≥n correcta
  cd /var/www/moonyetis-slots
  tar -xzf /tmp/moonyetis-real-wallet-20250629-1148.tar.gz --strip-components=1

  # Verificar que S√ç tiene las funciones de wallet real
  grep -c "autoConnectWallets\|Connect Real Wallet" frontend/index.html

  # Reiniciar aplicaci√≥n
  pm2 restart moonyetis-production
  pm2 logs --lines 10

content.text: I'll help you verify and extract the correct wallet file. Let me run these commands step by step.

Extract wallet files to production directory
